description: Load a CSV file, CSV from a file path, or a valid CSV string and convert it to a list of Data

inputs.name: csv_file
inputs.info: Upload a CSV file to convert to a list of Data objects

inputs.name: csv_path
inputs.info: Provide the path to the CSV file as pure text

inputs.name: csv_string
inputs.info: Paste a CSV string directly to convert to a list of Data objects

inputs.name: text_key
inputs.info: The key to use for the text column. Defaults to 'text'.
